title: Love it or hate it, AI is changing polling for the better
description: Pollsters need to be fast enough to match the fluidity of ever-changing battle lines. Artificial intelligence-optimized surveys are the fix.
content:
Democrats aren’t the only ones celebrating after the 2025's elections. So are political pollsters.
Although the polling industry materially undercounted the backing for the winning candidates and causes, pollsters accurately foretold the outcomes.

title: Jeff Bezos Creates A.I. Start-Up Where He Will Be Co-Chief Executive
description: Called Project Prometheus, the company is focusing on artificial intelligence for the engineering and manufacturing of computers, automobiles and spacecraft.
content:
